name: TempleDung42
description:
Short description

The feature of the game is that the running of the space here plays the role of limiting moves. You have to get to the central portal until all the blocks disappear.

How to play

The goal of the game is to reach the portal in the center of a randomly generated map. If the stones are on the way, then they can be destroyed with Destroy skill. You can also pick-up Weapon Upgrade to increase damage to the Stones.
